page.title: 03A schoolboy's day,Paulton.
page.content: {Saturday.}I wake at 7.30,my brother saying,"Come on,wake up!"I think,"Oh no!".I get half_dressed and then go to the dining room and get my All_Bran. I get properly dressed and ask for my pound pocket money.I switch on my VIC 20 computer and look at my games. Sometimes I like doing my own. My ambition is to sell a game to a manufacturer. I turn on the television. Then it's dinner time with beef burgers or fish fingers and chips. Then I automatically turn on for Doctor Who, but what do I see across the screen..."Wonder Woman!" How boring,so I get a tomato sauce sandwich,and watch. It's tea time and I read a computer magazine till bed time. I slowly shut myself off then sleep.
